data.title: KALKA (KLK) to SHIMLA (SML) Trains: Tickets, Fare and Availability
data.meta_description: Book KALKA to SHIMLA train ticket online and check timing, fare, seat availability and train schedule on RailYatri.
data.text:
Kalka to Shimla train route

Trains are the preferred mode of travel for over a thousand commuters on the Kalka to Shimla train route, one of the most popular destinations in India. Everyday, many travellers commute on the Kalka to Shimla railway route, and as many as 6 IRCTC trains run between the two stations, i.e., Kalka to Shimla . Kalka to Shimla are approximately 94 Kilometres apart from one another.

Kalka to Shimla Train Ticket Price

The Kalka to Shimla train ticket fare depends on various factors, such as preferred seat, routes selected, and date of journey. At RailYatri, the Kalka to Shimla train ticket price is affordable for all train travellers. Depending on the budget, one can reserve a third AC (3A) coach, a second AC (2A) coach, as well as the first AC (1A) coach on a train from Kalka to Shimla

Kalka to Shimla train time

The Kalka to Shimla train takes between 4 Hours 27 Minutes to 5 Hours 30 Minutes. The traveller can select a train based on their preferences among every day trains such as KALKA - SHIMLA Rail Motor (72451), Kalka - Shimla Shivalik Deluxe Express (52451), Kalka - Shimla Himalayan Queen (52455), Kalka - Shimla NG Express (52453), KALKA - SHIMLA NG Passenger (52457) and others. One can also choose from trains like KALKA - SHIMLA Rail Motor (72451), Kalka - Shimla Shivalik Deluxe Express (52451), Kalka - Shimla Himalayan Queen (52455), Kalka - Shimla NG Express (52453), KALKA - SHIMLA NG Passenger (52457) that run on a weekly basis. The RailYatri app and website allow users to check the live train running status, Tatkal train tickets and PNR status etc.

Book your Kalka to Shimla train journey with RailYatri.in

RailYatri.in helps you plan your train journey better with its accurate information on all possible railway enquiries. Train and railway reservation enquiries like Kalka to Shimla seat availability, Kalka to Shimla correct time table, Kalka to Shimla list of scheduled trains, Kalka to Shimla train status, Kalka to Shimla train fare calculator You can easily book your IRCTC train tickets online with RailYatri, an official partner of IRCTC.

RailYatri.in can help you plan a stress-free trip.

We make each booking a hassle-free experience for our travellers. Explore the trending deals and offers at the best price on the Kalka to Shimla trains. Download the RailYatri app to stay updated on the latest IRCTC information via our train enquiry centre and train travel blogs for insights. You can view information on Kalka to Shimla live train running status and PNR status on the RailYatri app. Visit the royal city of Lucknow in the most convenient way possible! Immerse yourself in the royal city of Lucknow! yourself in its culture, art and history.

Q) How far is Shimla from Kalka by train?

A) The Kalka to Shimla distance is 94 . Being one of the popular railway routes, several IRCTC trains run between Kalka and Shimla ( KLK to SML ).

Q) How many trains runs between Kalka and Shimla everyday?

A) There are 6 trains to book between Kalka & Shimla everyday. Travellers can check the correct train timings and fare on the RailYatri app.

Q) How many trains runs between Kalka & Shimla on a weekly basis?

A) There are 6 trains running between Kalka & Shimla . You can book train tickets with FREE Cancellation from RailYatri!

Q) Which is the fastest train that runs between Kalka and Shimla station?

A) The fastest train from Kalka to Shimla is KALKA - SHIMLA Rail Motor which covers a distance of 94 Kilometers in approximately 4 H 27 M hours.

Q) At what time does the first train depart from Kalka to Shimla Station?

A) The first train from Kalka to Shimla leaves at 03:30 Hrs from Kalka . Book this train from the FASTEST train ticket booking app - RailYatri

Q) What is the train ticket price from Kalka to Shimla Station?

A) Kalka to Shimla Train Ticket Prices start from Rs. 0 . You can book trains tickets to travel between Kalka to Shimla from RailYatri App.
